mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID as USER_ID, U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, U.COMPANY_ID as COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME as COMPANY_NAME, U.USER_CLASS as USER_CLASS, U.PW_CH as PW_CH FROM T_USER_INFO as U LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO as C on U.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PW, PHONE FROM T_USER_INFO
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PW, PHONE FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND USER_CLASS = 'ADMIN'
